Plot: Mr. David Marks was suspected but never tried for killing his wife Katie who disappeared in 1982, but the truth is eventually revealed.
Title: All Good Things
Actors: Ryan Gosling, Kirsten Dunst, Frank Langella, Lily Rabe
tomatoConsensus: It's well-acted, and the true story that inspired it offers plenty of drama -- which is why it's so frustrating that All Good Things is so clichéd and frustratingly ambiguous.
